spec.name: ADMIN_JWT_SECRET
spec.description: Secret for signing JSON Web Tokens for the Strapi Dashboard

spec.name: API_TOKEN_SALT
spec.description: Salt for generating API tokens. See: https://docs.strapi.io/dev-docs/configurations/api-tokens

spec.name: APP_KEYS
spec.description: Strapi Dashboard session keys for the Users & Permissions plugin and the Documentation plugin. See: https://docs.strapi.io/dev-docs/configurations/server

spec.name: DATABASE_CLIENT
spec.description: Type of database to use for Strapi. See: https://docs.strapi.io/dev-docs/configurations/database

spec.name: DATABASE_HOST
spec.description: Database hostname. When using Docker, this must be the hostname in the internal network. In Docker Compose the default is the name of the service.

spec.name: DATABASE_NAME
spec.description: Database name where your SQL tables are at.

spec.name: DATABASE_PORT
spec.description: Database port number

spec.name: DATABASE_SSL
spec.description: Enable SSL to use an encrypted connection. Typically `false` during development, and `true` in production.

spec.name: DATABASE_USERNAME
spec.description: Username for your database.

spec.name: DATABASE_PASSWORD
spec.description: Password for your database user.

spec.name: FRONTEND_PUBLIC_URL
spec.description: URL where the preview of pages in the Strapi Dashboard are hosted. As default you can use the URL for the public website.

spec.name: HOST
spec.description: Strapi Dashboard hostname where users will access Strapi. Use `0.0.0.0` to respond to any hostname.

spec.name: NODE_ENV
spec.description: Enable production mode for Node.js. See: https://nodejs.org/en/learn/getting-started/nodejs-the-difference-between-development-and-production

spec.name: PGADMIN_DEFAULT_EMAIL
spec.description: E-mail address for the initial administrator account. See: https://www.pgadmin.org/docs/pgadmin4/development/container_deployment.html

spec.name: PGADMIN_DEFAULT_PASSWORD
spec.description: Password for the initial administrator account. See: https://www.pgadmin.org/docs/pgadmin4/development/container_deployment.html

spec.name: PORT
spec.description: Strapi Dashboard port number.

spec.name: PREVIEW_SECRET_TOKEN
spec.description: Configure Strapi Dashboard and the website with the same secret, to be able to show unpublished content in preview mode.

spec.name: STRAPI_PRIVATE_URL
spec.description: URL where Strapi is available on the internal network, for example to access the GraphQL API.

spec.name: STRAPI_PUBLIC_URL
spec.description: URL where Strapi is available to the public.

spec.name: TRANSFER_TOKEN_SALT
spec.description: Salt for generating Transfer tokens. If no transfer token salt is defined, transfer features will be disabled. See: https://docs.strapi.io/user-docs/settings/transfer-tokens

spec.name: CSP_CONNECT_SRC_URLS
spec.description: Space-separated list of URLs to allow in `Content-Security-Policy` for `connect-src`

spec.name: CSP_FONT_SRC_URLS
spec.description: Space-separated list of URLs to allow in `Content-Security-Policy` for `font-src`

spec.name: CSP_FORM_ACTION_URLS
spec.description: Space-separated list of URLs to allow in `Content-Security-Policy` for `form-action`

spec.name: CSP_FRAME_SRC_URLS
spec.description: Space-separated list of URLs to allow in `Content-Security-Policy` for `frame-src`

spec.name: CSP_IMG_SRC_URLS
spec.description: Space-separated list of URLs to allow in `Content-Security-Policy` for `img-src`

spec.name: CSP_SCRIPT_SRC_URLS
spec.description: Space-separated list of URLs to allow in `Content-Security-Policy` for `script-src`

spec.name: CSP_STYLE_SRC_URLS
spec.description: Space-separated list of URLs to allow in `Content-Security-Policy` for `style-src`

spec.name: CSP_WORKER_SRC_URLS
spec.description: Space-separated list of URLs to allow in `Content-Security-Policy` for `worker-src`

spec.name: OGONE_PAYMENT_SERVICE_URL
spec.description: URL of the Ogone payment form target. Typically you will use different values for acceptance and production.

spec.name: MATOMO_HOST
spec.description: URL where the Matomo is hosted

spec.name: MATOMO_SITE_ID
spec.description: Website ID for the Matomo tracker API. See: https://matomo.org/faq/general/faq_19212/

spec.name: OPEN_FORMS_API_TOKEN
spec.description: Open Forms API token, used to access access forms from the website and the Strapi Dashboard. See: https://open-forms.readthedocs.io/en/stable/configuration/general/cms_integration.html

spec.name: OPEN_FORMS_API_URL
spec.description: URL for the Open Forms v2 API. See: https://open-forms.readthedocs.io/en/stable/developers/embedding.html

spec.name: OPEN_FORMS_CSS_URL
spec.description: URL for the Open Forms SDK CSS file. See: https://open-forms.readthedocs.io/en/stable/developers/embedding.html

spec.name: PANDOSEARCH_API_URL
spec.description: URL for the Open Forms SDK JavaScript file. See: https://open-forms.readthedocs.io/en/stable/developers/embedding.html

spec.name: STRAPI_ENV_LABEL
spec.description: Text describing the environment, used to warn users of Strapi Dashboard when they are not working in production. Can not be localized.

spec.name: PANDOSEARCH_API_URL
spec.description: See: https://developer.pandosearch.com/api/
